name: anchormarks
description: A modern web-based bookmark manager with browser sync, API access, and AI-assisted development

scripts.stop: . ./apps/.env 2>/dev/null || true; PORT=$(printf '%s' "${PORT:-3000}" | tr -d '\r'); VITE_PORT=$(printf '%s' "${VITE_PORT:-5173}" | tr -d '\r'); BACKEND_PID=$(lsof -ti:$PORT 2>/dev/null); VITE_PID=$(lsof -ti:$VITE_PORT 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$BACKEND_PID" ] && kill -9 $BACKEND_PID && echo "Stopped backend process $BACKEND_PID on port $PORT" || echo "No backend process found on port $PORT"; [ -n "$VITE_PID" ] && kill -9 $VITE_PID && echo "Stopped Vite process $VITE_PID on port $VITE_PORT" || echo "No Vite process found on port $VITE_PORT"
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.docker:up: [ -f ./apps/.env ] && export PORT=$(grep -E '^PORT=' ./apps/.env | cut -d'=' -f2- | tr -d '\r') || true && docker compose -f packages/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
